# 坏男孩法则

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/huainanhai-faze
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/huainanhai-faze
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install huainanhai-faze
huainanhai-faze <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g huainanhai-faze
huainanhai-faze <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
